aircraft.value: Nighthawk Stealth - AC-6034-375 at Regional Depot-A

defect_observed.value: Inverter output voltage deviation. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Lighting System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 15/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 16/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 19/09/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 21/09/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 21/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Inverter output voltage deviation. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Lighting System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
